website_summaries.verdict: Stylish and supportive, this throwback shoe is the one many customers who bought other models compare to – and wish they had purchased the Disrupter II instead.
pros: A cool, bulky retro shoe that's simultaneously lightweight and supportive
Comes in several options of black and white with contrasting color accents
Thick rubber sole for shock absorption
cons: May run large, so consider when sizing
Toe box feels small compared to rest of shoe

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged item. Counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived damaged with dents, creases and marks. The shoes did arrive on time. I’m not sure about the authenticity of these shoes since there is quite a lot of Mandarin stamping on the inside usually indicating counterfeit production. I have gone for a refund. I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: If you're a girl with bigger feet, these will make them look huge
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9 in men's to be safe, I wear a 10 in women's and I wanted extra room for thick socks. The fit is fine but they do make my feet stand out (not in a good way). They arrived with scuffs, I have attached a photo. I'm not sure if I'll keep them, just may not be for me. I took a star away for the condition in which they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of complments
customer_reviews.text: Finally a shoe I can brag on, fits great, very comfortable, I ware these at work, light track, and the gym, got a great feel and im gonna get another pair in white, the reason im writing is because I'm very particular about shoes and hard to please, first time no insert needed #very cool shoe, many complements
customer_reviews.author: Harold R.

customer_reviews.title: Underrated DadCore. Why spend hundreds on Balenciaga's when you ...
customer_reviews.text: Underrated DadCore. Why spend hundreds on Balenciaga's when you can spend under 100$ on these?
customer_reviews.author: MarcMyWerdz

customer_reviews.title: NO Leather at all.  100% synthetic material.  Ad is incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that the ad information is false / incorrect. I have emailed Amazon and the seller. If you see the ad and it still says they are leather at all, then the ad is still incorrect. The shoe label clearly shows these are 100% synthetic materials with a textile (synthetic) base. No leather anywhere on this shoe at all. I bought a pair of these about 10 years ago and they lasted a long time and actually had some leather in them. No more leather now. Not as good a shoe anymore. Just cheap fake PU. Not worth the price they are asking for this cheap fabric shoe. To bad everything is getting SO cheap and tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: The red comes off
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoe, fits really well and is very comfortable to walk in. I walked around Chicago for several days without any pain. Only downside is the color comes off on the edges of the stitched areas but if you get black or white, I doubt that would be an issue
customer_reviews.author: Colin McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Go a half size up.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I ordered a 9 because I’m ALWAYS a women’s 9 in any shoe but I would suggest going up a half size because my big toe touches the shoe and kind of uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS TYPE OF FILA'S
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS TYPE OF FILA'S !! Been buying them since 1998 !! They are GREAT In All Weather and on All Surfaces Especially Wet Floors, Ice and Snow. Now I wish I could Get The Black Ones. Only Thing is I Kinda feel that the Price is a Bit Much. I last bought them in a local store for about $49.95.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his shoes he wear's a 9 and I bought a 9 fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shardae'

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying, but overall worth it if I don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so so cute. They make my size 9 feet look chunky, yet much smaller, not that I'm complaining. My only grievance is how the very tip of the shoes seem to kind of ... 'stop' on the inside, but only in one of the shoes. The tips of the toes on my left foot cram up against it when I walk. Very annoying, but overall worth it if I don't have to walk anywhere far.
customer_reviews.author: Samira Daukoru

customer_reviews.title: I bought the 7 in the men size. it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 7 in the men size. it do fit, but it’s a little too big. So I’m going to give my son and get a smaller size for myself. so no money lost here.Lol
customer_reviews.author: NIKki💋

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my mom
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are in men sizes and I bought them for my mom so I looked up the fila shoe size converter to get the right size. My mom wears 9 in womens shoes so I ordered these filas in mens size 8.5! They fit her perfectly and she wears them everyday to work. I also wear filas to school. Great shoes that are super comfortable for my flat feet, I will definitely order more shoes from Fila!
customer_reviews.author: Nala Lava

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for work, and when I got them, I was pleasantly surprised to find that they are wide in the toes. I have wide feet and have a terrible time with shoes that taper the toes together. They hurt and I can't stand them. But these Fila's are comfortable and stylish (even in all-black trim). I love the other color schemes so much, I think I'll buy another pair in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: jb512512

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worst shoes ever. Don't waste your money. Bought these for my son back in April 2019. It's now June and the bottom is already coming off the rest of the shoes. They were cheaply built. The worst part is that he hardly wears them. He's 17 with about 5 pairs of shoes. So these are worn once a week for school. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: order 1/2 bigger
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I had to order 1/2 size bigger than my other FILA shoes.
customer_reviews.author: michael church

customer_reviews.title: Best FILA pair. Disruptor II
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. My spouse purchased the all-black FILA sneakers (disruptor II) and they fit as expected. Great quality and they even make him look somewhat taller. I like these too, and I want to find a pair for myself in women's. I also like the all-black since my spouse and I have similar tastes. Seller shipped promptly, and all is well. These are FILA's best style.
customer_reviews.author: Liset

customer_reviews.title: SUPERIOR PURCHASE.  Excellent arch support and ventilation.
customer_reviews.text: ALL AROUND PERFECT! Comfort first, style next, appearance prominent, ROCK STAR!!! Buy these shoes. You will NOT be disappointed. SO comfortable, easy to wear and care for. These Shoes BREATHE PROPERLY.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe design is awesome, however the shoe is very narrow. Rarely men have such narrow feet. After wearing the shoe for a while, my feet started to hurt. It would be nice if they made this shoe a little wider or they should have wide options.
customer_reviews.author: Zigbee

customer_reviews.title: True fit as in the stores
customer_reviews.text: Hi. Bought these for a friend that did some yard work for me. He always buys these sneakers for comfort and great wear. He walks all day doing pools.....5 or 6 days a week. He pays almost $10.00 more at the large shoe retailer. He deals with chlorine all day and they still last him over 6 months of daily wear. He says they clean up well....he likes to look presentable to his clients. I will surely purchase them again for him thru Amazon. If you need comfort and great support....order these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon from Carlsbad

customer_reviews.title: Love how they look...VERY uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 1/2 & usually order larger 11 to make sure they fit & I like them just a bit loose. these were still very tight & narrow. squeeze my toes across each other. I dont think a 12 would have been comfortable. And....they make the worst sound on hard floors when they are even slightly wet. Sounds like a a hundred frogs croaking in the swamp even after trying to dry them on rugs or towels.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great if you work on your feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have rheumatoid arthritis and work full time in a reatail auto parts store. I couldn't do it if it weren't for these shoes! The nice thick soles have saved my ankles and feet from pain! I have bought this same style at least 5 times! I tried Sketchers once....nope! Went right back to my Filas!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Love My Filas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit & style not bootleg they are the real deal the original FILA sneakers & the box they came in Summertime Basketball Court hangout & Block Party {Fresh Prince Style} Connecticut's Music for the People DJ Professor of Sounds. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not filas counterfeit i wish i could get my money back or amazon credit i cant wear these shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are not filas there are counterfeit, because i know my shoe size in filas there the only shoe thats comfortable on my feet, skechers shoes are the only other ones that fit comfortable, but these shoes dont fit, the left side shoe is to big, the right side fits better , if i order a different size a smaller one would of been to small and a larger one would be to big so theres a defect in this shoes and are not fila quality, i should of return them but i didnt because i cant wear these shoes since i bought them
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Crow

customer_reviews.title: Looks well made, just didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 11. Depending on the shoe I wear a 10.5 or an 11. I got it on my foot but it felt like a 10. Way too tight. It's a shame too, 'cause I like the look and build of the shoe. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beckham

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of Disruptors from local shoe store many years ago for work. Standing all day. Wanted another pair store closed decided to go on Amazon. Found the Fila Disruptors on Amazon 8 years ago so happy. I have purchased a few more pair since then for my family. These Filas are so comfortable. I get so many compliments on these shoes. I tell everyone that I got these from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Value & Style
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value & trendy rn if you’re into the whole mega sized over engineered sneaker designers like Balenciaga are putting out. Perfect for me bc I had foot surgery and have to wear a post-surgery boot for 6 weeks. The hight of the boot was making walking difficult so I got these and now walking is more stable and easy. I like the aggressive styling way more than I thought I would and will keep wearing after my foot heals and I can wear both pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit perfect and are so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfect and are so comfortable, I love filas they are the best shoes and these last year's and years I'm happy with my purchase 😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs short!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a men's 7.5 sized shoe (which is what Amazon suggested I order) thinking it would be slightly wider than a women's shoe. The width seemed fine however the shoe runs short. A 7.5 in men's translates to a women's size 9--which is about a half size larger than I normally wear. Therefore I am immediately returning the shoes. Oh and also the LOOK massive. Probably because of the thick sole and thick padded tongue.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good pair
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes. I prefer a little wider, but they are still wearable. Look solidly built with the sole firmly attached unlike another manufacturer who's shoes couldn't be machine washed because the soles would become detached. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: R PrestonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Shoe was mis-sized
customer_reviews.text: After wearing the shoe around my home for overall hrs., my feet, legs and back all hurt - I returned the shoes and the vendor assessed me a 50% restocking fee. I complained to Amazon Customer. Svc. and was credited the balance of the amount I originally spent. I would not purchase another item from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Renato Spinucci

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit was excellent. I love they way they feel when I walk in them. My only complaint is they mismatched the thread when assembling the shoes. Some of the threads are the acceptable black, but the stitching on the top of the toe box was in white thread.
customer_reviews.author: pepin

customer_reviews.title: ... am a life long fan of Fila's these was great looking, good "Fila" quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a life long fan of Fila's these was great looking, good "Fila" quality. I hated to send them back, but they was small on the toes. I even though, "can I shrink my foot any more". Like I had already. Sorry & thank you, maybe next time.
customer_reviews.author: Google Dox ds

customer_reviews.title: The item is as it is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this item before. I liked it then and that's way I reordered. The item, the expediency and the pricing was excellent!~
customer_reviews.author: Herman Scott

customer_reviews.title: I'm female so I rated these as wide but prob aren't for a guy
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compliments on these, super comfortable, cheaper than buying the Balencigia or other fashion brands but work just as well with your outfits. I think we all know this is a short term throw back to the 90's trend so if you want to participate in the trend without overspending these are a good bet.
customer_reviews.author: julie m

customer_reviews.title: They look very nice but they’re slippery and don’t have much support.
customer_reviews.text: They look good with just about any outfit. They run a bit too big and they don’t give you much support. Wore them to Universal Studios and got huge blisters after the whole day walking. They are slippery too but they’re so nice I’d buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Instantly add 1.5-2" to your height.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very stiff at first, will take some time to break them in. You will add approx 1.5 inches to your height, so if your a shorty or just want to be taller then these are for you. I am a very vanilla type person when it comes to tennis shoes/sneakers/runners Preferring just a white shoe, these shoes fit the bill nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Picture hides this shoe's bizarre tiny toe. Rest is boxy.  Ended up looking bizarre.  AVOID.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like these shoes at all when they arrived. Put them on once, asked for an opinion, got laughed at and put them back in the box for return. You might like them but the small toe with then big boxy change in size mid-foot was just to bizarre for me. YMMV. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: KevinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: good shoe, but i always destroy them.
customer_reviews.text: i always blow them apart wether its in one week or a year always the same places, never blew another shoe apart before i went to only wearing these but i stay with them, i like the grip tread and the feel of them. ill be buying another pair soon probably this week.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Cool but bulky
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter and they look really bulky on a girl. Great shoe and I got a fantastic price, just better suited for a boy. I think the trend has run out on it for girls anyway but just so you know.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the thick sole and heel. I weight 220 lbs and I have flat feet. With custom insoles these sneakers are very comfortable. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Trusty

customer_reviews.title: side ripped out along edge
customer_reviews.text: I just got these a bit ago but just now pulled them out of the closet 2 weeks ago and I was walking and my pinky toe starts catching some fresh air. to my huge disappointment I see a structural fail along the edge of my shoe. so disappointed. I have been looking forward to these shoes for a long time and now I have to go back and wear my DC's I have worn for over 2 years. I really like these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought New Balance for years, tried to stay loyal but I guess they changed, simply couldnt find any NB that were A) made in USA and B) fit as they used to, as per my average size. Found these Fila; they look good in all black and at the time were a deal i couldnt pass up at $33.50. They fit perfect, wear great, support is fine, and Fila is a well known name brand. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Benton Broken

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I stand on my feet 8-12hrs a day at work. These have been amazing! Usually I resort to putting some heavy duty gel insoles, in my work shoes, but with these I have not had the need to. I've been wearing them 5-6 days a week since purchasing and have had no issues...... Other than driving a manual transmission with a thick sole, that took a lil getting use to.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I love Fila products but these disruptors have really disappointed. Both pairs have very little room in the toe box and the end of my foot always feel cramped. Perhaps a wider shoe would solve that but I have never had that problem with any shoe I've purchased. The biggest problem is that the "leather" tore on the side of the shoe from the shoe string near the toe to the sole. Both pair I purchased experienced the same tear in the same spot. Poor design and poor quality of material. I hope Fila improves these flaws because they make a good looking shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Fila  disruptor shoes  Have poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought five pairs of these shoes throughout the last couple years And never again These Fila disruptor shoes are always cracking around the toilet area they’re constantly falling apart I thought after buying several of these shoes that the quality would get better and of course it never did I have a pair on my feet right now that are six months and 21 days old and the left shoe on the very front is cracked open again and my toes is showing No more fila shoes. This picture of this particular shoe is only 5 1/2 months old After five pairs of the toe area cracking on all of them shoes I’ve learned my lesson
customer_reviews.author: michael longueuil

customer_reviews.title: So far good value, Longer it lasts the better the value.
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 pairs of Fila fulcrum cross trainers for stair climbing. Fulcrums lighter than strada but strada great walking shoe or running shoe, fulcrums are not. Fulcrums are roomier fit than strad, strada more snug fitting but NOT to small. I wear size 12 with a slightly narrow foot. Strada snug, fulcrum roomy but both comfortable. Would buy both again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fila Men's Strada Disruptor
customer_reviews.text: They run a tad small. I've purchased other Fila sneakers that fit perfectly in my size but these sneakers in the same size as the other Fila's I purchased were a bit tighter in the toe area. Double check your size , maybe buy a 1/2 size larger then you usually wear. You can return them if they are not fitting properly as long as you ONLY try them on for fit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth McClure

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Packaging could’ve been better. It was a shoebox wrapped in plastic so the box looked super worn. The shoes were nice and white though besides a tiny black smudge. Not worth it enough to send back because it would not have been easy return.
customer_reviews.author: almost24girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, an online order that actually fits! They look just like the pictures and descriptions a spot on - If you want just more room than your normal fit, a half size up (if available) would not hurt - with socks on, I have no extra room - just the wear is not hurting - and the price is too good to let up on - they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Dad in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are very very comfortable shoes they are my first pair of Fila’s that I have bought I’ve been debating on getting these for over a year now I finally broke down and bought myself a pair they’re very comfortable I am only 5 foot four and they probably give me about two more inches on my height so when I wear them they’re a lot taller the shoes themselves were in perfect condition the shoe box is a little damaged but I didn’t expect any less with being in shipping
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Story

customer_reviews.title: Shoe leather split/pulled apart in right foot upper.
customer_reviews.text: The front side of the shoe, forward of the laces and about 1 inch behind the toe split and pulled away from the lower. Disappointed for sure as I expected better performance from this shoe which is used primarily for walking. The shoe is over a year old but was not even worn for many months.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice all white sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I like the styling of this sneaker. It's the second pair I own. The sizing is off. I wear a 10.5 but I had to buy a size 12 in this sneaker. First pair I tried on in the store. Also don't use liquid sneaker polish. It dried and cracked my first pair. Use paste polish. It's better for the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommendable
customer_reviews.text: I swear by the shoes I bought them for the last 20 years I have back problems and fibromyalgia and they work perfect for helping me work all day
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: They hurt
customer_reviews.text: These shoes HURT they are very nice looking but they push your feet forward causing your toes to jam at the front! Wearing these 8 hours a day at work I couldn't feel my toes (they were numb) not comfortable at all. They are stiff when purchased like all shoes but the more I wore them the more they hurt and I have ZERO feet problems and wear several kind of hard bottom no support shoes but these are just painful
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Fila Disrupters made gift recipient ecstatic!
customer_reviews.text: The recipient of the Disrupters was absolutely thrilled with the gift. I found them a bit heavier than I'd like but, even though his legs and ankles are not muscular, he loves the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jerry spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but...
customer_reviews.text: The soles on these Fila’s have deep ridges all over. Walking on pebbled areas or where there is some dirt, these bad boys will pick it up and carry it wherever you go. I can deal with the dirt, it happens, however get a pebble caught and you feel it. It’s annoying. Wouldn’t get these again unless I plan to live indoors forever.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe’s Human Slave

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I haven’t had a pair since u was like 6 or 7 years old ! I just turned 29 May 5th! This was my gift to myself 😍
customer_reviews.author: Jassy

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, comfy, and durable. They still look clean after partying in them numerous times. they fit a full size small though. if you are size 10 get an 11
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cooper-Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: The pair I got were Counterfit
customer_reviews.text: Just looked at mine and the pair I got were indeed counterfeits when I checked the logo on the sides. They are one size too small but my last pair were right on the money. I walked in them one day and my knees were hurting the next day and are still painful. Will not buy this brand again. Selling counterfeit shoes should be taken more seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Liz and Bob

customer_reviews.title: got it on sale
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually wear name brand sneakers but the price on these were a steal . Not a surprising they're the most comfortable shoes I owned not to mention the best looking as well . If they weren't so fancy I'd wear them more often and yes I bought two pair Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: C. Stacker

customer_reviews.title: Size is tight
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I ordered the wrong shoe or not. I've always like this style. I think it's a men's shoes. Says 10 1/2, which what I wear, but fits, curl my toes, tight. Return policy is probably good. I'll just find someone to give them to. But they fit tight. Could be women's I suppose. Pay attention to your complete order. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J.

customer_reviews.title: Only shoes my husband will wear
customer_reviews.text: Ok, So my husband first purchased these shoes from like Rack Room Shoes or some place like that several years ago. Once they wore out (like 3 years later) we went back but they only sold these UGLY bright red and funky looking FILAs. We found that these specific black ones could only be purchased online. He's VERY picky about his shoes, they must be black, must be FILA, and must be these! The last pair I bought for him was back in like 2008, and they are still looking NEW! It's a very good product, wears long, and looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Very beefy, nice sneaks
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about sneakers but for a low top under $30 the sneakers are superb, as soon as I put my foot in I knew they were awesome, just need to order up half a size, as soon as these arrived and I tried them on I ordered another pair of a different color... Update, bought 2 more pair, waiting for a fourth pair too hopefully go on sale to buy next...
customer_reviews.author: Bill nick

customer_reviews.title: shoes look like pasted with glue
customer_reviews.text: Smaller that expected because size chart is WRONG.. shoes have a bit of glue sticking out.. dont seem like original fila shoes...
customer_reviews.author: elaine simaan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Very fast service. Highly recommend this shoe. Although it states it a medium with, they fit like a wide. "Great"
customer_reviews.author: SELAH KIM

customer_reviews.title: Fila Men's Strada Disruptor
customer_reviews.text: The distributor of this shoe's Ad indicated that this shoe fits to size, so order your normal size. I normally wear a size 13, but this 13M was way too tight in the toe box. I really liked the style of this shoe and I have more pairs of Fila sneakers. I returned this pair today and I asked the company to check and see if they have a larger size in stock, e.g. 13W or 13.5M or W. I'd even be willing to try a size 14M because the sole is very thick and it would really look that much larger.
customer_reviews.author: SHELBY  L.  ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Just as depicted
customer_reviews.text: Love this sneaker. Correct sizing. These are bulky as depicted in the photograph. Very on trend now type of sneaker. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: divika

customer_reviews.title: I like them but...
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They look good, and have plenty of cushion. Only two things: 1.) the item's posting said they were leather. Nope. Synthetic upper, and 2.) maybe I haven't broken them in well enough, but after several hours of wearing them, they hurt the little toe on my left foot. Hopefully, they will stretch out a bit there.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. LaMonica

customer_reviews.title: Need another size 10 1/2
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers was order for Christmas and they are too small for my son. He only try them on on paper. They are still new and have not been worn. That should l do. Can l send these back for a size 10 1/2. I can not find any one who wear that size.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette F.

customer_reviews.title: No way to use it
customer_reviews.text: I have to buy shoe lats to expand then, after more than 6 month in the lats, still the left shoe knock on my toe. The size I bought was the same I bought about 3 years before in the same exact shoe model. I will never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: They fit good same as my other sneakers i have
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at sears before and all the sears have closed in our area. I got the same size and the same style as my other pair of this i have. They fit good same as my other sneakers i have. My other ones are still good and very very comfortable. I just wear them for good and forget to take them off after work so little stuffed up. I use to get nonthing but new balance no more this are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Rotty's

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. They are a large chunky shoe, so be aware of that. I love that feature, but some may not. The soles are very thick and a pure joy to walk on. Just be aware, this model is known for being like a half size too small, so I ordered the next full size up. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Violetta

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He loves them. They are good looking if you like a white shoe, and super comfortable. You know what they say, if your feet hurt, you hurt all over. These don’t hurt. He’s pleased.
customer_reviews.author: sharont

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and is comfortable. At first I had a bit of arch pain when I was getting used to the shoe (probably because of the thick sole and because it doesn't bend with the foot) but now they are my go-to shoe! Really cute 80s look if you are going for that. Be careful if you drive with them though since the treads are very grippy/chunky and you might get caught on the pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. You know that feeling when you put on the right tennis shoe and your next thought is “these feel so good, I wonder if I should buy a second pair now?”. Well these are those! Gotta love being a 1/4 inch taller as well. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: D.J. Westphal

customer_reviews.title: Cost
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my brother. Apparently has really wide feet . He try size 9 and 9.5. Could not get his finstones foot in. But I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jose G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I only wear Fila because they are the most comfortable sneakers I have ever worn. I have tried a lot of foot wear and hand down these are the best. I would recommend to any one to try these. thank you guys for making my feet very happy. I will be getting another pair!!!
customer_reviews.author: James D Walker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have that lame memory foam that loosens up your fit in an hour =)
customer_reviews.text: Stronger support then the sketchers type of tennis shoe .. feels like the Jordan back in the day when you needed upright balance priority.. that memory foam not present which is why I buy these every year.. memory membrain packs down and you get lose fit within a few hours ....
customer_reviews.author: Donny B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am more than pleased with this shoe. I walk a lot at work and had back surgery one yr ago and by far this was the best day of walking I’ve had in yrs. very good cushion and support where you need it . Great shoe, in the store I would expect to see twice as a much.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald

customer_reviews.title: Day to Day shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a casual pair of sneakers I can slip on if I don't feel like dressing up. And that's what I've found in these shoes! They fit their grip the side was nice so I'm never slipping even if I run for the bus! They are not the most comfortable shoes out there but my feet won't hurt if I wear them all day. I'd advise people with sensitive feet to give it a try but keep it in mind. Probably just buy a softer sole. Overall it is good to shoe would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gld

customer_reviews.title: So shiny! 😍❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love the holo Filas they are really awesome and some people think I’m crazy for wearing crazy stuff but I love them and they are quite noticeable so if your not ready to be asked all about that I don’t recommend but if you are someone like me who likes to be different and themselves I definitely recommend! ❤️❤️❤️😁
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: 6 months old seams falling apart
customer_reviews.text: 6 months old. About a month ago the left shoe seam came apart at heel. Super glued it back together then yesterday noticed right shoe seem coming apart. Looks unrepairable.
customer_reviews.author: Fred W.

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loved his shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 yrs old son and he loves it, he said it is very stylish, his friends like it and its comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: meggan madden

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Had tried in a store before buying. Just disappointed in how quickly they are wearing out. Not lasting long.
customer_reviews.author: KaymarieRY

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The fit a little tight, but it may be the thick socks I wear.
customer_reviews.author: barbara patton

customer_reviews.title: More information about size sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of the sneaker in the color my side is a 9 and 1/2 I did some reviewing and I went to a size 10 but that's too tight in the toes in the front of the sneaker
customer_reviews.author: lawrence breault

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I use these to put Fliers on Door handles which i've been doing for 32 years. These are the best I can recall for that. In other words they have very good support. Very "meaty".
customer_reviews.author: jamesjazzy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is back up since company switched owners few years back. Great for those with wide feet. Length is true to size. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: my son loves these ugly shoes!
customer_reviews.text: can't call it. Looks like some 70 year old man sneaker, but the 16 year old boy said that's the style. *shrugs*
customer_reviews.author: twinzmom

customer_reviews.title: smart lookimg
customer_reviews.text: every paid of kswiss starts off with a tiny metal anchor at the base (first lace) as you walk this metal piece pushes upward and irritates my foot. switched to FILA with no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Merrel Wilkenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, a major step up.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable shoe I've worn in years. I bought these as my "dress" sneakers, but, after wearing them for a week I decided to make these my work shoes. I work on my feet all shift in a warehouse and I can finally say I now come home free of pain in my feet. That is a major step up. I purchased a second pair as my clean "dress" sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe do with 1/2 to 1 size larger than normal wear
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size of these shoes based on previous reviews. I normally wear size 9.5 -10 so I went with 10 based on suggestions from reviewers. This is a perfect fit for me. The shoe is lightweight and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carver

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 12 shoe in sneakers. I couldn't even get my foot in this. They are very narrow. I returned them and had to pay a restocking fee so beware if you buy shoes from this company.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Small Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of these shoes but the black ones are way smaller than the white ones I got directly from Foot Locker.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Krismiss

customer_reviews.title: Great price for amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has not had new tennis shoes in years. Always work boots. So I bought him 2 name brand pairs of shoes. He is so proud and looks so very handsome in them. Shipping was not as fast as some products but, only a few days difference. And well worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great show for the price .. I purchased because when I was a teenager these are all I wanted for Christmas one year and never got them.. they did have a weird scuff on the side of dirt
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I owned a pair years and years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Then I decided I wanted to get me another pair and there just as smooth and fly as when I used to wear them back in the day. They fit perfect just like before!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Paredez

customer_reviews.title: Bargain Buy
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased these for my son. He loves them. They fit as expected. Good quality. I wasn’t sure what to expect since I purchased from the Marketplace but the shoes came clean and very good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H.

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The shoes is ok like the pictures but the size is not as in the size chart , I wear 41 in euro sizes and i choosed 7.5 American size M as in the chart but when I receive the shose its 40 euro so don’t depend on the size chart i dont know the US sizes it’s tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RUN SMALL
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, and I enjoy wearing these on the daily walks my wife and I take. However, these sneakers run SMALL. I have worn a size 12 for as long as I can remember, but these were much too tight and had to be exchanged for a size 13. I recommend the sneakers, but you might need a size bigger than you usually wear in other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Koellhoffer

product_meta.title: Fila Men's Strada Disruptor
product_meta.description:
This lightweight, retro-inspired sneaker from Fila is perfect for every day and then some. Made with a durable nubuck upper with a smooth, soft finish, this shoe features a removable cushioned insole and an extra-thick rubber sole for excellent shock absorption. A padded tongue and collar and soft lining keep feet feeling fresh and comfortable throughout the day.

Fila began in 1911 in the small alpine town of Biella, Italy, a place renowned for manufacturing the world's finest textiles and weaving fabrics with impeccable quality, true innovation, and extraordinary beauty. Born of the city and its traditions, Fila is inspired by Biella's dedication to artistry, luxury, and elegance. It's Fila's birthright, it's in their soul, and it defines their future. They continue to enrich the athletic experience by improving comfort and performance with Italian design, quality craftsmanship, and refined materials. There is no feeling quite as luxurious as that of playing in Fila, and that is the reason for Fila's existence. We create what is desired, not just what is necessary.
feature_bullets: Leather-Synthetic Blend - The blending of both real and synthetic leather with this Fila shoe has created a lighter shoe that's a lot more durable, yet still retains that full-grain leather look.
Molded Rubber Outsole - As an athletic sneaker, Fila ups and ante and strength and durability, particularly with this strong, flexible, durable rubber outsole.
Embroidered Logo - While a minor detail to some, having the logo embroidered onto the shoe means that it's there permanently, so it's not going to leave a spot on the shoe where it falls off.
Removable Cushioned Insole - Not only does this insole provide plenty of comfort for men who like to remain active, but it's also removable and washable, so you can keep your shoes fresh.

Lightweight EVA Midsole - The midsole of a shoe provides stability and a barrier between the upper and outsole, and this light EVA molded midsole gives you strength and stability without added weight.
